name: part_008
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei Live Tour 2024 ＂Spectra of Nova＂ [eWqiZHIoOjk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Hoshimachi Suisei performs a high-energy section of 'Newton' with red lighting and flames.
Short interlude with audience applause and a transition to blue stage lighting.
Performance of 'Newton' from the beginning, featuring blue theme lighting and lasers.

subtitles.original: 歴史になるんだ
subtitles.english: It becomes history

subtitles.original: そこに立つ私に
subtitles.english: For me, standing there

subtitles.original: Ah ah 不可能かもないの
subtitles.english: Ah ah, nothing is impossible

subtitles.original: 尋常じゃなくドレスで
subtitles.english: In an extraordinary dress

subtitles.original: それが常識と思われても知らないんだ
subtitles.english: I don't care if that's thought of as common sense

subtitles.original: 強引のペースで波乱は続くから
subtitles.english: The turbulence continues at a forced pace

subtitles.original: 世界外覆せば
subtitles.english: If I overturn the world

subtitles.english: So give it your all, honey

subtitles.english: Because your voice will surely reach

subtitles.original: さいたま！
subtitles.english: Saitama!

subtitles.english: You can still put out more voice, right!

subtitles.original: 行くぞ！
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: はい！はい！はい！はい！
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: あぁ 自転なくない？
subtitles.english: Ah, isn't there no rotation?

subtitles.original: 燃やしたいなって
subtitles.english: I want to burn it up

subtitles.english: Standing in the smoke, in the heart of my heart

subtitles.original: 膨張してるんだろう
subtitles.english: It's probably expanding

subtitles.original: Ah ah リミット数にブーストして
subtitles.english: Ah ah, boost to the limit count!

subtitles.original: つまり燃やし尽くせば
subtitles.english: In other words, if you burn it all out

subtitles.original: 不可思議なくなって歴史になるんだ
subtitles.english: The mystery disappears and it becomes history

subtitles.original: そこに立つ私に
subtitles.english: For me, standing there

subtitles.original: Ah ah 不可能かもない尋常なんだよ
subtitles.english: Ah ah, it's an extraordinary thing that might not be impossible

subtitles.original: それで食らえんだ
subtitles.english: Take that!

subtitles.original: 適当な理由で口挟むなよ
subtitles.english: Don't interject with half-baked reasons

subtitles.original: 知らないならちょっと黙るか道を開けろよハニー
subtitles.english: If you don't know, just shut up or clear the way, honey

subtitles.original: 世界もそして錯乱へ
subtitles.english: The world then falls into confusion

subtitles.english: Burn it all out!

subtitles.english: Reincarnate into the heat!
